title: Jewels and Other Stories
description: Long-listed for the Frank 'O Connor International Short Story Award 2011The landscape of 1970s South Africa lives and breathes in these stories. This debut collection is populated by a wide and surprising range of unforgettable characters: an artist who finds his power in the dusty earth; a mother who waits for a letter; a collector of cacti who seeks her own kind of freedom; a shopkeeper in trouble in an outpost country town . . .
author: Dawn Promislow
